name: DEUS VULT | Online VR sword fighting
description: Fight against other medieval warriors all around the world! Deus Vult is an online medieval fighting game which uses cutting-edge weapon physics to make you feel like a real knight. Discover a world full of mystery, customize your character and FIGHT FOR GLORY!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: i5 64bit Graphics: GTX 960
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 64bit Graphics: GTX 1070
